This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

description: <c=@flavor>May fortune favor you in the new year.</c>

name: Relic of the Demon Queen
description:
Poison that you apply reduces healing by an additional amount. Disabling a foe applies poison.
Disables include stun, taunt, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, and launch.

name: Skysage's Boots Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current boots. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

description: Chill nearby enemies after executing a <c=@abilitytype>shout</c> skill.

name: Necrotic Essence Hammer Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

description: Cleanse conditions from yourself and nearby allies after using a healing skill.

name: Necrotic Essence Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Baggy Cargo Pants Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current leg armor. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Weaponmaster Training Document
description: Used to progress Weaponmaster Training to wield any weapon you have learned, regardless of elite specialization.

name: Inner Nayos: Hero's Chest
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains materials from Inner Nayos.

name: Necrotic Essence Longbow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

description: Use this box to claim one Solar Astrolabe weapon skin of your choice.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Relic of Antitoxin
description: Outgoing condition cleanses remove an additional condition. <c=@reminder>This can only affect an ally once every 10 seconds.</c>

name: Fashionable Kilt Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current leg armor. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Relic of the Fractal
description: When you inflict bleeding on an enemy with 6 or more stacks of bleeding, also inflict burning and torment.

name: Relic of Dagda
description: After using an elite skill, fire a projectile at the target or nearest enemy that damages and inflicts conditions. Damage scales with the recharge of the elite skill.

name: Relic of Vass
description: After using a healing or elixir skill, your next few attacks inflict poison. <c=@reminder>Healing skills can only trigger this effect once every interval.</c>

name: Relic of the Afflicted
description: Create a Death Nova at a foe's location upon their defeat that inflicts poison and bleeding. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>

name: Banner of the Bastion of the Natural
Skysage's Shoulder Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current shoulder armor. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Obsidian Light Regalia
description: <c=@flavor>Imposing armor forged with the help of dwarven wizard Lyhr.</c>

name: Relic of Cerus
description: Upon using an elite skill, summon an Eye of Cerus that emits a rotating line attack, dealing damage and converting boons into conditions.

name: Obsidian Light Pants
description: <c=@flavor>Imposing armor forged with the help of dwarven wizard Lyhr.</c>

name: Relic of Nourys
description: Gain stacks of Nourys's Hunger every interval when you remove boons from enemies. Consume 10 stacks to grow larger, dealing increased damage, taking reduced damage, and converting a percentage of outgoing damage into healing.

name: Relic of Durability
description: Gain protection and regeneration after using a healing skill.

name: Necrotic Essence Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Relic of the Herald
description: Gain concentration after granting a boon to an ally.

name: Relic of the Adventurer
description: Gain 50% endurance after using a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>

name: Shattered Kryptis Carapace
description:
Double-click to read. Can be safely discarded after acquiring.
Used to progress Astral Ward Weapons to unlock new weapon proficiencies.

name: Relic of the Defender
description: Heal a percentage of your maximum health after blocking an attack. If you block again within 5 seconds, you heal less each time down to a minimum of 1%.

name: Relic of Dwayna
description: Regeneration you apply is more effective.

name: Obsidian Light Crown
description: <c=@flavor>Imposing armor forged with the help of dwarven wizard Lyhr.</c>

name: Gift of Relics
description:
In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of Relics, a Gift of Condensed Magic, a Gift of Condensed Might, and a Gift of Craftsmanship to create a legendary relic.

A Gift of Relics is made by combining these items in the Mystic Forge:
• 25 Mystic Facets
• 25 Mystic Clovers 
• 150 Globs of Ectoplasm
• 1 Gift of Research

name: Obsidian Heavy Breastplate
description: <c=@flavor>Imposing armor forged with the help of dwarven wizard Lyhr.</c>

description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

name: Frenzied Cephalopod
description: Double-click to release for 1,500 karma.

name: Relic of the Weaver
description: Upon using a <c=@abilitytype>stance</c> skill, deal increased strike damage for a duration.

description: Grant barrier to yourself and nearby allies after you use a healing skill.

name: Skysage's Helm Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current helm. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Relic of the Cavalier
description: Grant yourself aegis, quickness, swiftness, resistance, and might when striking an enemy with your mount's <c=@abilitytype>engage</c> skill.

description: <c=@flavor>Imposing armor forged with the help of dwarven wizard Lyhr.</c>

name: Relic of the Aristocracy
description: Gain 3% condition duration for 8 seconds when inflicting weakness or vulnerability on a foe, up to a maximum of 5 stacks. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 1 Second)</c>

name: Mystic Facet
description:
Used in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of Relics. Used for the legendary relic.

A Mystic Facet is made by combining these items in the Mystic Forge:
• 1 Relic
• 250 Piles of Lucent Crystal 
• 250 Piles of Lucent Crystal
• 250 Piles of Lucent Crystal

name: Reclaimed Bonds Mount Adoption License
description:
Gain a random mount skin that you do not already own from the Black Lion Stables. Right-click to preview available mount skins.

<c=#F8C56E>All unobtained skins have an equal chance of dropping.</c>

name: Relic of Lyhr
description: Upon healing an ally, shield up to four allies, redirecting a percentage of any strike damage they take to yourself. Allies may only be protected by one shield at a time.

name: Relic of the Centaur
description: Gain stability when you use a healing skill.

name: Relic of the Ice
description: After using an elite skill, launch icicles that inflict chilled at nearby enemies.

name: Obsidian Heavy Gauntlets
description: <c=@flavor>Imposing armor forged with the help of dwarven wizard Lyhr.</c>

name: Relic of Peitha
description: After shadowstepping or using a deception skill, fire a blade at a nearby enemy after a short delay, applying torment and increasing your strike damage against that target.

description: <c=@flavor>Imposing armor forged with the help of dwarven wizard Lyhr.</c>

name: Banner of the Bastion of Strength
Leaf Glider

name: Relic of the Zephyrite
description: Summon crystals that apply protection and resolution to allies after using an elite skill. Crystal duration scales with the recharge of the used skill.

name: Relic of the Astral Ward
description: Gain a Signet of the Astral Ward after using a signet skill. Using a signet skill while this signet is active consumes it to remove conditions from nearby allies and grant them resistance.

name: Relic of the Midnight King
description:
Grant might and fury to nearby allies when you disable an enemy.
Disables include stun, taunt, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, and launch.

description: Double-click to convert to materials.

name: Relic of the Krait
description: After using an elite skill, emit a wave of corruption that inflicts damaging conditions.

name: Necrotic Essence Dagger Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: Relic of Mabon
description: Upon applying might while in combat, gain Mabon's Strength. At 10 stacks, your might stacks become more effective for a duration, after which you lose all might and Mabon's Strength.

name: Relic of the Daredevil
description: After dodge rolling in combat or evading an attack, your next attack is guaranteed to be a critical hit. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 1 Second)</c>

name: Obsidian Medium Shoulders
description: <c=@flavor>Imposing armor forged with the help of dwarven wizard Lyhr.</c>

name: Necrotic Essence Scepter Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.

name: Relic of the Citadel
description: After using an elite skill, call down an artillery strike that inflicts stun on the skill target or nearest enemy.

name: Relic of Isgarren
description: After evading an enemy's attack, place the Eye of Isgarren on them for a duration. You deal increased strike and condition duration against enemies with the Eye of Isgarren.

name: Afternoon Wine Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Fool's Tall Tonic
description: Consume to gain a heightened state of awareness.

details.name: Height-Eye Enhancement
details.description:
+5% Magic Find
+5% Karma
+5% Gold from Monsters
+5% Experience from Kills
Applies dramatically taller field of vision during April Fools.

name: Devil-Rending Dagger Skin
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.
This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.

name: Candy Corn Gobbler's Blessing
description: Has a chance to give a random Halloween transformation or boost.

name: Slate Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Shattered Stone Wings Backpack Skin
description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

name: Pastel Lavender Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Smooth Berry Dye Kit
description:
Contains one random armor dye from a pool of 25 colors that includes six exclusive colors.

Dyes can be unlocked for unlimited use to color armor on all characters. Dye bottles can also be recycled in the Mystic Forge.

<c=#FFC957>All dyes have an equal chance to drop.</c>

description: 28 Slots

description: 32 Slots

name: Celestial Invisible Cat Cape
description: <c=@flavor>A cape given to you by the King of All Cats. Or an invisible cat pretending to be a cape. It's hard to say, because you can't see it.</c>

description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

description: Can be used to overwrite any currently active foolish enhancements and get back to business.
